title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify it (moved an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without the extension, as it is not requested.
7) Click Ok.
Observed Behavior: The Navigator adds the file to the specified location, but without showing the file extension.
EB: The expected behavior is that when saving the file using 'SaveAs', the file should be added to the specified location in the Navigator with the correct file extension.
SR:
